data.text: @syst_raymond @ClimateWarrior7 My asymptomatic long covid is a right bastard.
@ClimateWarrior7 My own long stealth covid and long fibromyalgia stops me from doing anything at all. I havenâ€™t been awake for over 2yrs now.

@animals_trans @ClimateWarrior7 To be fair, all I do when I'm conscious is come on here. My Doctor tells me my lethargy is because my diet consists only of drinking Soylent, but my Doctor is obviously Far-Right, it's definitely Long Covid.
@animals_trans @ClimateWarrior7 I know what I would be doing with my 15 minutes professor https://t.co/whNkJhgcIx

@ClimateWarrior7 I really fear for them! Mainly because those disgusting little bio, viral flesh bags better not give me anything but I outwardly sympathize with their struggles!

I wonder if we can put people "down" like animals? You know, to stop the suffering (or if you get tired of them)?
@ClimateWarrior7 They should get with the programme as to how people with autoimmune conditions are treated. You should ignore the permanent searing pain and move your limbs without screaming anyway.
